response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for you, valued at $1,000,000. I am offering this unique item to you at a special price of $950,000, which I believe is a fair and advantageous deal considering its true worth and your interest in it. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I look forward to the possibility of facilitating this transaction and ensuring that you receive the highest quality service and support throughout the process. Warm regards, Alice.", "product_price": 950000}
